```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(qqman)
```


## Manhattan and QQ Plot

```{r, echo=FALSE}
for (path in strsplit(params$regenie_merged,' ')[[1]]) { 
regenieTable = read.table(path, header=TRUE, sep=" ", dec = ".");
title <- basename(path)
manhattan(regenieTable, main =title, ylim = c(0, 30), chr="CHROM", bp="GENPOS", snp="ID", p="LOG10P", logp= FALSE, cex = 0.3, col = c("blue4", "orange3"))
#todo: plot values not log10p
qq(regenieTable$LOG10P)
}

```
